title: Little Ice Age and Black Death

content.question: The Little Ice Age, which lasted from 1300 to 1850 C.E., likely had the strongest effect on which of the following?

choices.label: The fall of the Aztec civilization
The severity of the Black Death

content.answer: The severity of the Black Death

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
